prompts.description: Assess organizational change readiness using established change management models

input_parameters.name: change_description
input_parameters.description: Description of the proposed change initiative

input_parameters.name: organization_context
input_parameters.description: Context about the organization, culture, and history

input_parameters.name: assessment_model
input_parameters.description: Change model to use for assessment

output_format.dimension_scores: scores for each dimension of the selected model
output_format.risk_factors: identified risks to successful change adoption
output_format.readiness_gaps: gaps that need to be addressed before or during change

prompts.description: Map and analyze stakeholders for change initiatives

input_parameters.name: stakeholder_list
input_parameters.description: Optional list of known stakeholders with roles

input_parameters.name: analysis_type
input_parameters.description: Type of stakeholder analysis to perform

output_format.engagement_strategies: recommended engagement strategy per stakeholder group
output_format.resistance_risks: stakeholders likely to resist and mitigation strategies

prompts.description: Create adoption and rollout plans for change initiatives

input_parameters.name: timeline_constraint
input_parameters.description: Any timeline constraints or target dates

output_format.phase_plan: detailed phases with activities, owners, and timing
output_format.training_plan: training approach including methods and schedule
output_format.change_network: recommended change champion and super user structure
output_format.sustainment_plan: plan for reinforcing and sustaining the change
output_format.adoption_metrics: KPIs and metrics to track adoption success
